content.query:
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD ='Year@2023'

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL Accessdp203ddpool
WITH IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET='sv=2022-11-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2024-07-20T19:19:01Z&st=2024-07-20T11:19:01Z&spr=https&sig=c2sHZOh3cLlR7e4hicakVmAMr7mmtW51Z%2FlytghDEc8%3D';



CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE srcActivitylogcsv
WITH 
(
    LOCATION = 'https://dp203adls2.blob.core.windows.net/mydata',
    Type = HADOOP,
    CREDENTIAL = Accessdp203ddpool
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CsvFileFormat
WITH(
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
        FORMAT_OPTIONS 
        (
            FIELD_TERMINATOR=',',
            FIRST_ROW=2
        )
    );



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ActivityLog
(
   [Correlationid] varchar(200),
   [Operationname] varchar(300),
   [Status] varchar(100),
   [Eventcategory] varchar(100),
   [Level] varchar(100),
   [Time] varchar(100),
   [Subscription] varchar(200),
   [Eventinitiatedby] varchar(1000),
   [Resourcetype] varchar(300),
   [Resourcegroup] varchar(1000),
   [Resource] varchar(2000))
WITH (
    LOCATION='/ActivityLog-01.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE=srcActivitylogcsv,
    FILE_FORMAT=CsvFileFormat
)


select * from ActivityLog
